definitions.definition: A path for riding a horse (which is controlled by a bridle ).
A right of way defined in law, over which the public have the right to travel on foot or on horseback or leading a horse, with or without a right to drive animals of any description along the way.

main_definition: A path for riding a horse (which is controlled by a bridle ).
secondary_definitions: ( England ) A right of way defined in law, over which the public have the right to travel on foot or on horseback or leading a horse, with or without a right to drive animals of any description along the way.
